argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ho0f | |- 0hop : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | #P_ho0val | |- ( y e. ~H -> ( 0hop ` y ) = 0h ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( y e. ~H -> ( x .ih ( 0hop ` y ) ) = ( x .ih 0h ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hi02 | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( x .ih 0h ) = 0 ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( x .ih ( 0hop ` y ) ) = 0 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ho0val | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( 0hop ` x ) = 0h ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih y ) = ( 0h .ih y ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hi01 | |- ( y e. ~H -> ( 0h .ih y ) = 0 ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih y ) = 0 ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( x .ih ( 0hop ` y ) ) = ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih y ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( 0hop ` y ) ) = ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih y ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elhmop | |- ( 0hop e. HrmOp <-> ( 0hop : ~H --> ~H /\ A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( 0hop ` y ) ) = ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 11, 12 | #P_mpbir2an | |- 0hop e. HrmOp |
